data.name: 0000 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Since Haruhi was going to investigate in the library, I decided to join to keep an eye on her.

data.name: 0001 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Coming with me are Asahina and Koizumi.

data.name: 0002 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even if we do encounter something strange, with these two can we can hide it from Haruhi.

data.name: 0003 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Is the library bigger than the one in the elementary school?

data.name: 0004 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's bigger, but there's nothing you would be able to read.

data.name: 0005 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehhh, really...?

data.name: 0006 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: High school libraries don't have children's books or manga. Go read a picture book.

data.name: 0007 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Boooring.

data.name: 0008 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And yes, my little sister's here too. I'll be expecting her to keep Haruhi distracted.

data.name: 0009 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even Haruhi wouldn't want to talk about stuff that would scare my very young little sister.

data.name: 0010 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If that keeps her interest away from the seven wonders, then that's only good news.

data.name: 0011 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Sister, you have a very important role to…

data.name: 0012 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ―Huh?

data.name: 0013 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: What's wrong, Kyon?

data.name: 0014 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I don't see my little sister anywhere…

data.name: 0015 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh, but she was here just now, wasn't she?

data.name: 0016 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, I was just talking to her a moment ago.

data.name: 0017 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: But she's definitely not here?

data.name: 0018 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Is it teleportation? Unlike yourself, your little sister has supernatural powers?

data.name: 0019 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No way--She definitely doesn't have anything like that.

data.name: 0021 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It doesn't appear to be teleportation. I saw her begin to walk more slowly.

data.name: 0022 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you noticed, you should've stopped her.

data.name: 0023 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I myself hadn't realized her intent until mere moments ago.

data.name: 0024 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite a fine job indeed--She was trying to naturally break away from us.

data.name: 0025 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Act as proud as you like, but I'm still not happy about it.

data.name: 0026 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Maybe she just went to explore?

data.name: 0027 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't it because Kyon said the library would be boring?

data.name: 0029 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: That might be right... She seemed to want to explore the school.

data.name: 0030 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What a load of work she is.

data.name: 0031 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't say it out loud in front of Haruhi, but this school is pretty dangerous at the moment.

data.name: 0032 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But I don't know what'll happen to my sister, so I definitely can't leave her be.

data.name: 0033 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You lot go ahead to the library. I'll go find my sister.

data.name: 0034 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I had high hopes for you, but you betray your brother's expectations like this...

data.name: 0035 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Wait, Kyon--It'd be best for everyone to split up and search.

data.name: 0037 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I support that notion. This school is rather large, so the more help the better.

data.name: 0038 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She can't have gone that far--she only just left.

data.name: 0040 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: But this school is big, so... I'm worried.

data.name: 0041 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's weirdly powerful words were quite persuasive.

data.name: 0043 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Besides, you yourself got lost, Asahina.

data.name: 0045 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Yes... it took me a long time to get used to this school.

data.name: 0046 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then let's split up. We'll regroup in the library.

data.name: 0047 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Okay, I understand...

data.name: 0049 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Very well.

data.name: 0051 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I probably owe Asahina an apology.

data.name: 0052 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry my little sister is causing so much trouble, Asahina.

data.name: 0053 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It's fine! Let's make sure to find her as soon as we can.

data.name: 0054 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I'm only ever motivated at the start, then as time passes I worry more and more...

data.name: 0055 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's smile was filled with care, and it was too bright to look at directly.

data.name: 0057 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I have no choice but to apologize to Koizumi here.

data.name: 0058 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry about my little sister holding us up, Koizumi.

data.name: 0059 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm not bothered--in fact, I'm quite thankful about it.

data.name: 0060 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0061 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya is a kind person, so I always knew she would offer to help search.

data.name: 0062 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This distracts her from the seven wonders, so it's a rather beneficial turn of events.

data.name: 0063 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He says something so cruelly cunning with that refreshing smile on his face.

data.name: 0064 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Work together with Miss Suzumiya, and try to make her as worried as possible.

data.name: 0065 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Make her worried?

data.name: 0066 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Like saying your little sister might be crying.

data.name: 0067 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My sister's no scaredy-cat or crybaby. If I had to choose, I'd say she's an ultra optimist.

data.name: 0068 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, let's leave it at that.

data.name: 0069 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that I think I'm persuasive at all.

data.name: 0071 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I agreed to search for my sister with Haruhi.

data.name: 0072 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, where would she have gone? I know she's stupidly energetic.

data.name: 0073 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's good to be full of energy. For children it's a necessity.

data.name: 0074 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's in a surprisingly good mood considering her search for the wonders was interrupted.

data.name: 0075 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's wrong, Kyon?

data.name: 0076 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No... nothing.

data.name: 0077 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No need to let it get to you. Your sister is so cute, no one would believe you're related.

data.name: 0078 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is that right...

data.name: 0079 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But we should really find her before she gets properly lost.

data.name: 0080 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I know she's no Mikuru, but this school is pretty confusing.

data.name: 0081 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru and Koizumi are gonna search the main building and the central building.

data.name: 0082 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So we should go back.

data.name: 0083 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi and I decided to return.

data.name: 0085 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: She's not here, I guess. Ah--you, Computer Society member, wait a second!

data.name: 0086 (405.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Wh-wh-what do you want, Brigade leader?

data.name: 0087 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A Computer Society member was just passing us in the hallway, looking terrified.

data.name: 0088 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Have you seen a small girl?

data.name: 0089 (405.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: I haven't seen anything like that.

data.name: 0090 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Really? You haven't taken her back to your clubroom to model for you?

data.name: 0091 (405.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: No way--we strictly don't allow any outsiders in. Especially at a critical time like this.

data.name: 0092 (405.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: I'd be terrified to let children inside anyway.

data.name: 0093 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess that's true. There's no predicting what a child might do.

data.name: 0094 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Can we really trust you?

data.name: 0095 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's safe to trust him--my sister's interested in physical activity, not academics.

data.name: 0096 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, then I guess it's best to search outside. Ah, let us know if you see her.

data.name: 0097 (405.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: G-got it.

data.name: 0098 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That poor club member returned to his clubroom shaking.

data.name: 0099 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I think if you're innocent, you should act more confidently about it!

data.name: 0100 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can understand him being completely terrified by Haruhi.

data.name: 0102 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We came to Genkotsu Square after having no luck in the courtyard.

data.name: 0103 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Huh, it's Haru-nyan and Kyon.

data.name: 0104 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Little sister!

data.name: 0106 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She gave an innocent smile and waved at us, unaware of the crime she committed.

data.name: 0107 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Annoying.

data.name: 0108 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Little sister, what a relief! I thought you might be lost!

data.name: 0109 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Lost? I was just exploring.

data.name: 0110 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This building is pretty confusing so it's easy to get lost, you know?

data.name: 0111 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: I'm not Kyon--I'm not that dumb.

data.name: 0112 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What did my little sister just say?

data.name: 0113 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, we'd better let Mikuru and Koizumi know that we found you.

data.name: 0116 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, huh?

data.name: 0117 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0118 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: My mobile isn't connecting, Kyon. Looks like the signal's bad.

data.name: 0119 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's probably thanks to all the abnormal space being generated.

data.name: 0120 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Should we head back to our meeting point in the library?

data.name: 0121 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I guess so.

data.name: 0124 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Neither Mikuru nor Koizumi are here.

data.name: 0125 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We looked around the library, but couldn't find either of them.

data.name: 0126 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They must still be looking for your little sister.

data.name: 0127 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm sorry that my unworthy little sister is here.

data.name: 0128 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: My mobile won't connect here either.

data.name: 0129 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'll go look for them.

data.name: 0130 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, that makes sense.

data.name: 0131 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's more or less my responsibility anyway.

data.name: 0132 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, you keep an eye on my sister over here. Don't let her run away.

data.name: 0133 (405.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hm, got it. Come here, little sister. Let's find a picture book or something.

data.name: 0134 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Okay, Haru-nyan.

data.name: 0135 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She listens to Haruhi way better than her own brother... Don't let Haruhi influence you.

data.name: 0136 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As her brother, I left the library praying for as much.

data.name: 0139 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, who should I look for first?

data.name: 0140 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Obviously Asahina, I don't even need time to think about it.

data.name: 0141 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I decided to wander the hallways in search of Asahina's pretty figure.

data.name: 0142 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah, Kyon.

data.name: 0143 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I didn't end up getting as far as wandering, Asahina's gentle figure was right there.

data.name: 0144 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina.

data.name: 0145 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I'm sorry, I haven't found your little sister yet.

data.name: 0146 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We found her. She's with Haruhi in the library right now.

data.name: 0147 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Whoa, what a relief!

data.name: 0148 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She seemed genuinely really glad. Asahina truly is a wonderful person.

data.name: 0149 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry for causing all this trouble.

data.name: 0150 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: No, I'm sorry I couldn't be of help.

data.name: 0151 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: But I'm really glad. If she got lost and the the sun went down it would've been a disaster.

data.name: 0152 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, especially right now.

data.name: 0153 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: You're right, especially the school right now... It's scary.

data.name: 0154 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did something scary happen?

data.name: 0155 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Just a little... From place to place it would suddenly get cold and give me a weird feeling.

data.name: 0156 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was deeply touched that she was kind enough to search for my sister despite that.

data.name: 0158 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, if it isn't Asahina--and you're here with her.

data.name: 0159 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That must mean you found your sister and you've come to meet us, I suppose?

data.name: 0160 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, well deduced.

data.name: 0161 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's the obvious conclusion from some basic reasoning. Is Miss Suzumiya in the library?

data.name: 0162 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right. With my little sister.

data.name: 0163 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then let's head to the library, shall we?

data.name: 0166 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I aimlessly search, I wonder who I'd bump into first?

data.name: 0167 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was preparing myself for disappointment in case I found Koizumi first, and there he was.

data.name: 0168 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my?

data.name: 0169 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I really did bump into you first then, huh.

data.name: 0170 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I was just returning to the library since I was unable to find your sister.

data.name: 0171 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: By the looks of things, it appears you've found her. What an utmost delight.

data.name: 0172 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not that much of a big deal, but she's in the library with Haruhi.

data.name: 0173 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: With Miss Suzumiya? Then I wouldn't be wrong to say that Miss Asahina isn't back yet, right?

data.name: 0174 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why does this guy keep guessing everything I'm about to say?

data.name: 0175 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's merely basic reasoning.

data.name: 0176 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is it now.

data.name: 0177 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then shall we go find Miss Asahina?

data.name: 0178 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I can do it myself.

data.name: 0179 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, no need to say that. There's something I'd like to discuss with you.

data.name: 0180 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What? Has the situation gotten that bad?

data.name: 0181 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This time you've figured out what I was planning to say.

data.name: 0182 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Am I supposed to say it was the obvious conclusion now? How ridiculous.

data.name: 0184 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah, Kyon, Koizumi... What a relief... I was scared...

data.name: 0185 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina ran over with tears in her eyes.

data.name: 0186 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Hah... Did you find your little sister?

data.name: 0187 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, she's with Haruhi in the library.

data.name: 0188 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah, that's great! It's scary--the school right now. It kept suddenly getting cold...

data.name: 0189 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: ...the wind kept blowing and there were noises. Not that I ended up seeing anything...

data.name: 0190 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, the instability is worsening.

data.name: 0191 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I want to do something about it as soon as I can...

data.name: 0192 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I agree with Asahina one hundred percent.

data.name: 0195 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When we returned to the library, another search awaited us.

data.name: 0196 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So this time Haruhi's gone?

data.name: 0197 (405.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yeah, Haru-nyan said she was gonna search and told me to wait here.

data.name: 0198 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That impatient little...

data.name: 0200 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Will you go look for her?

data.name: 0201 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Let's all go together. I don't want to get separated again.

data.name: 0202 (405.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I don't want to be alone anyway...

data.name: 0203 (405.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's right. It makes sense for us to take group action on this occasion.

data.name: 0204 (405.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Yeah.

data.name: 0205 (405.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The lot of us ended up searching the school for Haruhi as a group.

data.name: 0206 (405.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Apologize to Mikuru

data.name: 0207 (405.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Apologize to Koizumi

data.name: 0208 (405.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search for Mikuru

data.name: 0209 (405.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search for Koizumi
